Details.Name: GreateFor
Details.Feature: 0% administrative fee for foreign currency transactions. Cross border fee of 0.2% levied by MasterCard still applies.
10% cashback on Travel and Health, Beauty & Wellness; 0.2% cashback on all other spend.

Details.Name: SmallPrint
Details.Feature: A minimum spend of S$500 has to be charged within 90 days to enjoy the Complimentary One-way Airport Transfer. Limited to 2 redemptions per Cardmember per year.
10% cashback is capped at S$60 per statement month. Upon reaching the cap of S$60, 0.2% cashback is applied on the additional spend. No cashback cap for 0.2% cashback.
A minimum spend of $500 with at least 8 transactions of $30 or more per statement month has to be charged to the card for 10% cashback.

Feature.Name: Welcome Gifts
Feature.FeatureDetails: Limited edition ez-link card with S$40 stored value
Feature.FeatureRequire: 1. Successfully apply for 2 new principal CIMB Credit Cards (except CIMB Classic MasterCard) 2. Make a minimum of 3 transactions with either of the approved principal CIMB Credit Card within 1 month from the card approval date. 3. Application must be approved no later than 30 April 2016.

Details.Name: Card Information
Details.Feature: Annual Fees Waiver - ConditionFree for Life
Annual Fees Waiver - ConditionFree for Life
Minimum Repayment3% of the outstanding balance or S$50.

Details.Name: Eligibility
Details.Feature: Supplementrary Card Minimum Age18 years old
